column2: "Oh? It's pretty rare to run into anyone around here."
"Hm? You're the ARKS member that I ran into the other day. It's good that you're enthusiastic."
"But this place is a little different. If you don't have any reason to be here, then you'd best head back."
"If you have reason to stay, then you had better finish up quickly."
"I considered it earlier, but where have I seen you before?"
"No, sorry. I guess it's just my imagination."
"But you sure seem calm, even here. You must be quite capable."
"Even so, don't get too far ahead of yourself, my young ARKS friend."
"If you lose sight of the big picture, you may make a grave mistake."
"Sorry. I'm old, so I tend to find myself lecturing people. I don't want people to make the same mistakes I did."
"Oh, and one last piece of advice. If you happen across a little girl, run."
